item2.heading: Weekly Bulletin
item2.description: Weekly News of the Holy Vietnamese Martyrs Catholic Church

about.heading: Holy Vietnamese Martyr's Catholic Church
about.paragraph: The Vietnamese Martyrs Parish of the Archdiocese of Atlanta is a community of Vietnamese-born Catholics celebrating and spreading the Catholic faith, while maintaining and developing the Vietnamese cultural tradition.
about.paragraph11: Red: the blood of the 117 Vietnamese Martyrs
about.paragraph12: Brown: the skin's color of Vietnamese
about.paragraph21: The Big Round: symbol of the earth as the source of life
about.paragraph22: The Vietnamese Map: the country of Vietnam
about.paragraph23: The Horizontal & Vertical Parallel Lines: 3 parts of Vietnam - North, Central, South
about.paragraph24: The Cross: the three parts' Vietnamese people join and become the people of God, namely the Catholics
about.subparagraph21: The centralization is Christ as the Shining Sunrise
about.subparagraph22: The sacramental sign is the Eucharist
about.paragraph26: The Lights: the Evangelization of the Catholics
about.paraHeading3: The meanings - From The Outside Into The Center
about.paragraph31: The Vietnamese Catholics are the descendants of Holy Vietnamese Martyrs
about.paragraph32: They themselves become the people of God
about.paragraph33: They themselves focus their lives in Christ as the Shining Sunrise
about.paragraph34: They practice and deepen their faith in and through the Eucharist
about.paragraph35: They continue to evangelize the World

home.heading: We hope to receive your support, understanding and cooperation
home.line1: in order for all of us to have a successful school year.
home.line2: Our thanks to you, parents of our wonderful students.
home.line3: Following the guidance of the Archdiocese of Atlanta and Gwinnett County,
home.line4: the staff and students of Việt Hồng Vietnamese Language School
home.line5: will be wearing face masks until further notice.
home.line6: News and announcements during the school year
home.line7: will be regularly updated on this page.
home.announcement: Please contact us for more information at Viet.Hong.School@hvmatl.org

home.heading: Giáo Lý and Thiếu Nhi Thánh Thể Program
home.line4: Every Sunday from 9:00 AM to 11:10 AM
home.line5: At building Dominic Savio, Tôma Thiện and Carlos Acutis
home.line6: Attend Mass for Children at 11:30 AM
home.line8: For class 8, 9, 10 and Hiệp Sĩ I, II, III
home.line9: Every Sunday from 11:10 AM to 1:10 PM
home.line10: At building Dominic Savio, Tôma Thiện and Carlos Acutis
home.line11: Attend Mass for Teens at 1:30 PM
home.title: St. Joseph School
home.announcement: News and announcements during the school year for Giáo Lý and Thiếu Nhi Thánh Thể Program will be regularly updated on this page.
